name: friendlyfunfact
0:
”Alexa, ask friendly fun fact daily fun fact for fun fact”
”Alexa, tell friendly fun fact daily fun fact I want a fun fact”
”Alexa, ask friendly fun fact daily fun fact to tell me a fun fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: friendly fun fact daily fun fact
des: The Friendly Fun Fact skill is meant to help users learn more by offering them a curated set of fun facts. As time permits, new facts are added to the skill to make it more interesting.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
